website_summaries.verdict: This drone is safe, easy to use, and pretty durable – but it's only a toy.
pros: Protective shield around propellers makes it safe for kids to play with inside and outdoors
Doesn't require much skill to operate
cons: Many users wish the drone held its charge a bit longer
Though fun, it's not much more than a toy

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: It was really nice while it lasted. My 3 year son loved it and was able to figure it out in a day. Unfortunately, 3weeks of light use, one of the motor became faulty and the thing spins out of control. Originally rated 1 start but changing to 4 star, because seller sent a free replacement. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is really short
customer_reviews.text: My son and his friends (6yr olds) love love this drone. I took a star away because the charge only last 10min. Then you have to charge it again. Really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: youngjuicy

customer_reviews.title: Only 8 minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and flimsy. Requires 45 minutes of charging for 8 minutes of use, which was highly disappointing for my grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: GramFall4

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought several for grandchildren for Christmas. Everyone had a great time with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne J.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for the kids, these didn't even come close to working as described. Just flew around out of control. Returned easily for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Positive
customer_reviews.text: Product functioned as described but battery life is a little short. The kids love them though and they charge quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Norris

customer_reviews.title: Immediate Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our grandchildren took these home after getting them as Christmas gifts and they played all night with them!! Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product and its packaging looked so cheap. Honestly, I don't think I would pay more than $3 for this product. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Nik

customer_reviews.title: Great support from vendor!
customer_reviews.text: The product was defective and the vendor replaced it immediately. My grandson loves playing with this toy and it is the hit of the family. His siblings also play with it and enjoy it very much. I value highly a vendor who will stand by their products and support customers the way Bompow did on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mint Milano

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: After three weeks, my drone stopped working, so I contacted Bompow for help. They promptly responded and replaced the drone. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Conor H

feature_bullets: Hand Controlled Flying Toy: You just need to throw the flying ball toy out gently, it can start to fly immediatedly. The most suprising feature is that it can fly in the opposite direction when your hands are close to it. Thanks for the advanced technology, you can also use your hands to control its direction by closing it. Great fun to play

Hovering and 360° Rotating Auto Fly: The flying ball is built in 4 powerful rotation motors to provide power of 360° rotation flying. There is also a high flight hover when flying to a certain level. If you don't operate for 1-2 seconds, the aircraft will descend a little and hover again. Super cool to play

Rechargeable Battery and Shining LED Light Indicator: The mini flying drone has a built-in and rechargeable Lithium battery that only needs 40 minutes to charge fully, the flying time is 5-8 minutes. It also has 2 speed models, green light for normal speed and blue light for fast speed. The flying toy is also beautiful played in bedroom at night with the LED indicator

Strong and Special Aircraft Body: This flying toys is made of non-toxic and high grade ABS material which is lightweight, flexible and collision resistance. The bouncy material design can resist damage when it falls. And the flying aircraft can also move away intelligently when it detects solid objects
After Sales Service: If the flying toy doesn't satisfy you. You can contact us 7x24 for any problems. We'd love to serve you at any time
